snippet: In the United States, nearly 100 people take their own lives each day. Here is a short list of suicide prevention hot lines and other resources for those who think that they or someone they know may be at risk.
lead_paragraph: In the United States, nearly 100 people take their own lives each day. Here is a short list of suicide prevention hot lines and other resources for those who think that they or someone they know may be at risk.

headline.seo: Suicide Prevention Hot Lines and Other Resources
